name: Seirei (itch)
description:
Summary:

Explore the spirit world you find yourself in. Collect masks to gain abilities (fox for sprinting, rabbit for jumping).

Use the abilities to reach shrines and pray at them to collect spirit essence.

Be careful when wandering beyond the fog.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • SHIFT to sprint
  • SPACEBAR to jump
  • E to interact (pray at shrine and pickup masks- your mouse must be pointing at the masks to be able to collect them when pressing E!)
  • F to switch between masks (must have picked up at least one)
